alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Mason; Putnam; Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:34PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gallia, southeastern Lawrence, southwestern Mason, Cabell, west central Putnam and north central Wayne Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chesapeake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 25 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Barboursville, Milton, Ona, Burlington, Crown City, Athalia, Lavalette, Scottown, Ashton, Pea Ridge and Green Bottom. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 5 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
